mapper.update: UPDATE address a `order` b SET a.neighbour_id = #{neighbourId}, a.street = #{street}, a.number = #{number}, a.reference = #{reference}, a.tx_id = #{txId}, a.tx_host = #{txHost}, a.tx_user_id = #{txUserId}, a.tx_date = #{txDate} WHERE b.order_id = #{orderId} AND b.address_id = a.address_id AND b.tx_status = 1
